page.title: 20CONTRIBUTORS FROM BRAILES
page.content:
This survey was undertaken by the 24 children of the Upper Junior Class of Brailes C.E. Primary School, under the direction of the Headmaster, Mr.Duncan Watson.The work was carried out as a Project during the Summer Term 1985. Individual contributions were made by Lisa Bryan,David Morris,Reuben Peckham and Stacey Righton.Much of the computing was done by the children themselves,led by Sophia Jacques.
Additional writing and information was submitted by Mr.& Mrs.Dennis Gilbert, Rev.Nicholas Morgan, Mrs.Jean O'Donoghue, Mr.John Pearce, Mrs.Mary Rea, Mrs.Monica Taylor, Mr.& Mrs. Trevor Wilde, Mrs.Glenda Woods and Mrs.Eileen Watson, who also assisted with the editing of the texts.
